hadiths.text: Abu Al-Abrad the freed slave of Banu Khatmah narrated that he heard Usaid bin Zuhair Al-Ansari - and he was one of the Companions of the Prophet - narrated that :the Prophet said: "The Salat in Masjid Quba is like Umrah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ فِي مَسْجِدِ قُبَاءٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Salat Performed In Masjid Quba
